text: “Nia daangada ala bolo gu ihala i taaligi tangada, le e mee hua di hai bolo ginaadou gu ihala ga daaligi gii mmade ma ga haga modongoohia mai go nia daangada hagamodongoohia mee dogolua be mada logo. Di hagamodongoohia mai tangada e dahi e dee dohu di haga donu ana mee.35.30 Deuteronomy 17.6; 19.15
